test_cases.title: Verify that the 'Transportation Services' option is visible in the electronic services section of the portal
test_cases.steps:
1. Log in as a portal administrator
2. Navigate to the electronic services section
3. Verify if the 'Transportation Services' option is displayed
test_cases.expected_result: The 'Transportation Services' option should be visible in the electronic services section

test_cases.title: Test adding a new transportation service through the control panel
test_cases.steps:
1. Log in as a portal administrator
2. Access the control panel for managing transportation services
3. Add a new transportation service
4. Save the changes
test_cases.expected_result: The new transportation service should be successfully added and saved

test_cases.title: Test publishing a transportation service after approval
test_cases.steps:
1. Log in as a portal administrator
2. Navigate to the transportation services section
3. Select a transportation service to publish
4. Request approval from the authorized personnel
5. Verify if the transportation service is published
test_cases.expected_result: The transportation service should be published after approval

test_cases.title: Verify that the 'Transportation Services' option is added to the electronic services list
test_cases.steps:
1. Log in as a portal administrator
2. Navigate to the electronic services section
3. Check if the 'Transportation Services' option is included in the list
test_cases.expected_result: The 'Transportation Services' option should be added to the electronic services list

test_cases.title: Test displaying published transportation services with their status
test_cases.steps:
1. Log in as a portal administrator
2. Access the section for viewing published transportation services
3. Check the status of the displayed transportation services
test_cases.expected_result: Published transportation services should be displayed with their respective status (active or expired)

test_cases.title: Verify that attachments are hidden for expired transportation services
test_cases.steps:
1. Log in as a portal administrator
2. Access the section for viewing transportation services
3. Check if attachments are hidden for expired transportation services
test_cases.expected_result: Attachments should be hidden for transportation services that are expired
